data.message: According to the internet, Raziel gives visions of phallus. As a kid, I spent WAY too much time around Raziel. I saw way too many phalluses. I cut off Lucifers...I mean Satan's. I left it in a box...in Idris. Maybe it'll come when he calls it, like Michael's sword. Where's Ithuriel when I need someone to appreciate my jokes? Lol

replies.message: About Lucifers phallus, I'm not that deprived. I'm deprived of love and companionship.

Those blades that were in my knuckles in the supernatural...Michael called his sword (or one of his knights), and I came too. I like literally flew over.  Shadowhunters is not just a dramatic TV show. Ha ha ha ha.

This is for real. I'm not in drugs. The supernatural phenomena is gone now. I still don't have a half. Heh. Even angels have twin flames or some crap. Jealous? I am. I should've never came when Ithuriel called. I don't know what good it did. Heh. Pun slightly intended.
